camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Mid-range Aerial Drone Shot, 45Â° Oblique angle
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 35mm Tilt-shift lens equivalent (Vertical perspective correction), High sharpness, Minimal distortion
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharp details from foreground to background residential blocks

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Blue Hour (Civil Twilight), Sky is a rich deep azure (not black)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Soft Cool Skylight Fill mixing with Crisp Artificial Facade Lighting, High Contrast between illuminated structure and cool environment
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Clear evening sky, Clean air (high visibility), Calm atmosphere, No haze
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Soft cool-toned ambient shadows, No harsh cast shadows

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm tungsten office spill (3000K), Visible floor slabs through high-transparency glass, Controlled brightness (not overexposed)
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Dominant Vertical LED Mullion Strips (Neutral White 4000K), Rhythmically defining the building, Crown/Roofline accent lighting

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Warm bollard lights along the road, Integrated step lighting on stairs, Soft wash on plaza pavement
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Uplighting on plaza trees creating glowing green canopies, Contrast against dark paving

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Corporate Blue & Gold, Deep Cobalt Blue Sky vs Champagne/Neutral White Architecture
color_and_grading.temperature: Cool Environmental Base (7500K) with localized Warm/Neutral highlights (3500K-4000K)
color_and_grading.post_processing: Clean digital finish, Low noise, High clarity on architectural lines, Slight bloom on LED strips, Vivid blue saturation

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: V-Ray 6 (Night settings), Corona Renderer, Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Corporate Architectural Photography, High-end Office Development Visualization
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Physically accurate glass refraction and reflection, Precise lighting falloff

environment_textures.ground_surface: Asphalt roads glowing from streetlights, Dense urban fabric
environment_textures.foliage_style: Organized urban landscaping, Young trees in planter grids, Manicured lawn strips
